name: Rimepacted Devil
movement: 30 ft. walking, 20 ft. burrowing through snow
description: The Rimepacted Devil is a Medium fiend with a fierce demeanor, wielding icy powers and a sturdy build. Its claws are sharp and imbued with cold energy, and its presence creates a swirling vortex of frigid wind around it.
memorable: It can knock opponents prone with its icy winds and control the battlefield while being resistant to various types of damage.
goals: To dominate foes in combat using its control over cold and ice, seeking to create hazardous environments.
relations: Often encountered alongside other fiends or devils serving similar goals of chaos and malevolence.
environment: Icy and cold regions, typically found in frigid landscapes or areas affected by magic.
strengths: Immunities to cold, fire, and poison, as well as advantages on saving throws against magical effects.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it less effective in stealth and potentially exposed to ranged attacks.
attacks: Uses slashing claws and frost-infused bolts to deal both slashing and cold damage, with some attacks hindering movement.
most_powerful_ability: Freezing Smite unleashes a wave of cold energy, dealing significant cold damage and potentially restraining foes.
senses: Possesses Devil's Sight, allowing it to see in magical darkness.
skills: Has a passive Perception of 14, demonstrating reasonable awareness in its surroundings.
additional_information: Can create a hazardous area with its Frigid Vortex ability.
Burrows through nonmagical snow and ice for mobility.
Effectively manages battlefield control with cold damage abilities.
Advantage on saving throws against spells enhances its survivability.
Powerful multiattack options, combining melee and ranged strikes.

cold creature that manipulates ice and snow
fiend that creates freezing winds in battle
menacing devil that attacks with cold and claws
